homeCards.title: Robust Roofs, Guaranteed Protection
homeCards.text: We specialize in high-quality roofing solutions that stand the test of time. Our expert team ensures your home is protected with durable materials and expert craftsmanship.
homeCards.alt: Residential roofing installation and repair by MAS Contractors Richmond VA

homeCards.title: Your Personal Oasis, Exquisite Designs
homeCards.text: Transform your bathroom into a luxurious retreat with our expert remodeling services. From elegant fixtures to modern layouts, we create spaces that blend functionality with style.
homeCards.alt: Modern bathroom remodeling and renovation showing luxury fixtures

homeCards.title: Inspiring Porches, Outdoor Elegance
homeCards.text: We create stunning outdoor spaces that enhance your home's curb appeal and provide a perfect retreat for relaxation and entertainment. Our custom porch designs are tailored to your style and needs.
homeCards.alt: Custom patio and porch design construction for outdoor living spaces

homeGreenCards.title: HOME ADDITIONS
homeGreenCards.subTitle: Expand your space. Enhance your life.
homeGreenCards.text: We design and build custom home additions that seamlessly blend with your existing structure, providing you with the extra space you need for your growing family or lifestyle.
homeGreenCards.alt: Home addition construction site extending residential property

homeGreenCards.title: KITCHEN
homeGreenCards.subTitle: Your dream kitchen, come to life
homeGreenCards.text: From sleek, modern makeovers to timeless, classic designs, we specialize in creating kitchens that are both stunning and highly functional. We are the trusted professionals for high-quality granite and quartz installation, ensuring a perfect, luxurious finish.
homeGreenCards.alt: Luxury kitchen renovation with granite countertops and custom cabinetry

homeGreenCards.title: BATHROOMS
homeGreenCards.subTitle: Your personal oasis, exquisite designs
homeGreenCards.text: Transform your bathroom into a luxurious retreat with our expert remodeling services. From elegant fixtures to modern layouts, we create spaces that blend functionality with style.
homeGreenCards.alt: Elegant bathroom design with modern tiling and fixtures

homeGreenCards.title: DECKS
homeGreenCards.subTitle: Outdoor living at its finest
homeGreenCards.text: We create beautiful and functional decks that enhance your outdoor space, providing the perfect setting for relaxation and entertainment. Our custom designs are tailored to your lifestyle and preferences.
homeGreenCards.alt: Wooden deck construction and outdoor entertainment area

homeGreenCards.title: ROOFING
homeGreenCards.subTitle: Superior protection for your home
homeGreenCards.text: We offer comprehensive roofing services, including repairs, replacements, and installations, to ensure your home is protected from the elements. Our team uses high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship to deliver durable and reliable roofing solutions.
homeGreenCards.alt: Professional roofing team installing weather-resistant shingles

homeGreenCards.title: SIDING
homeGreenCards.subTitle: Flexible protection for your home
homeGreenCards.text: Enhance your home's exterior with our top-notch siding services. We provide a variety of styles and materials to improve your home's appearance and protect it from the elements, ensuring long-lasting durability and curb appeal.
homeGreenCards.alt: Vinyl and fiber cement siding installation for home exterior protection

heroL.title: Why Choose MAS Contractors?
heroL.subTitle: Experience
heroL.text: We are trusted home remodeling experts that have served 100's of satisfied customers throughout the Richmond and Charlottesville area.
heroL.text2: We are known for providing affordable prices using the industry's best quality products matched with great installations.

heroR.subTitle: Warranty
heroR.text: We believe in the products that we install and we stand behind them with our one-year warranty of workmanship.
heroR.text2: We provide honest, straightforward quotes and offer reasonable prices and top-of-the-line products from the industry's most trusted brands.

heroHome.text: All of our work is professional and we pride ourselves on our craftsmanship.

heroAbout.title: About Us
heroAbout.text: MAS Contractors is a family-owned business with over 11 years of experience in the construction industry. We don't just want to be your contractor for life. That's why we approach every project with respect, attention to detail, and quality craftsmanship, which we've become known for in the local area.

about.title: Choose MAS Contractors because we are:

list.subTitle: Qualified
list.description: We're fully licensed and insured for your protection.

list.subTitle: Experienced
list.description: We've been in the remodeling business for over a decade.

list.subTitle: Careful
list.description: We'll take care of your home like it's our own.

list.subTitle: Dedicated
list.description: We won't stop before we've taken care of every detail.

list.subTitle: Professional
list.description: We'll prioritize your satisfaction above all.

about.aboutFooter: MAS Contractors has completed hundreds of home remodeling and commercial projects in and around the Richmond, VA area.

contact_services.title: TRIM
contact_services.description: We install interior doors, crown molding, coffered ceilings, wall panels and built-in shelves exactly as you imagined it.

contact_services.title: ROOFING
contact_services.description: Whether it’s a minor roof repair, an older roof in need of a full replacement. We provide all the assistance you need to help service you every step of the way!

contact_services.title: KITCHEN
contact_services.description: The kitchen is the heart of the home, let us transform it by installing cabinets, countertops, tile backsplash, flooring, and appliances.

contact_services.title: BATHROOMS
contact_services.description: Increase the value of your home. We love adding new bathroom cabinets, adding soaking tubs, new storage closets, and new shower tile.

contact_services.title: DOORS
contact_services.description: We can install storm doors, sliding glass doors, french doors and front entry doors that come with built-in safety mechanisms and in a variety of patterns, colors, and glass panels.

contact_services.title: DECKS
contact_services.description: We offer deck replacements and custom deck builds including porches and pergolas. We offer various materials to choose from for it to be long lasting for your home.

contact_services.title: SIDING
contact_services.description: New siding doesn’t only bring new life to your home’s exterior but also can reduce the amount of maintenance needed to upkeep your home.

contact_services.title: WINDOWS
contact_services.description: With our expansive offering of numerous manufacturers, we can help you change any window to a high quality and energy efficient window.

contact_services.title: HOME ADDITIONS
contact_services.description: Add value to your home with your desired additional space. We take care of all required city permits, plumbing and electrical work. Your dreams will become a reality.

specialties.title: Custom Room Additions
specialties.description: Your room addition will provide you with a lifetime of enjoyment while increasing the value of your home.
specialties.descriptionLarge: MAS Contractors LLC offers top-quality home renovation services. Whether it's a kitchen update, bathroom modernization, or a complete overhaul, our expert team brings your vision to life. Experience excellence with MAS Contractors LLC today.
specialties.descriptionLarge2: Contact us for a free consultation before making any important decisions, and we will help you navigate through permits and regulations, providing you with tools and expertise so that you can find the best choice for your room addition project.

specialties.title: Tile
specialties.description: Let us assist you in choosing tile from an endless array of colors, designs, and materials.
specialties.descriptionLarge: Tiles can be great for use in a number of different settings around your home, or even in a commercial setting. They offer amazing durability and have real design flexibility, given all the colors, patterns, and designs that you can choose from. MAS ensures to use waterproofing moisture barriers as needed to create a smooth and durable surface that will last.
specialties.descriptionLarge2: We can provide all different kinds of tiles such as ceramic, porcelain, glass, stone, marble, and granite, perfect for a variety of needs and uses, including:

specialties.title: Finish & Trim Carpentry
specialties.description: Transform the bare bones of any house or building into a usable and visually pleasing space.
specialties.descriptionLarge: Our carpenters use the best trim carpentry techniques during the vital stage of building. We provide a full spectrum of carpentry for residential and commercial projects including
